org.docgene.model

Class XMLRedirect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docgene.model.XMLRedirect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.docgene.model.Article, org.docgene.model.ArticleReference, ParagraphElement, StyledElement

    public class XMLRedirect
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.docgene.model.Article, org.docgene.model.ArticleReference
    Represents an XML redirect article.

        desc - the article description. The article getID() will be equal to its description
